name: Neuro-Tether
description: A slender neural implant that subtly enhances the wearer's focus and reflexes. It also allows for direct connection to external devices.

flavor.rationale: Developed by a disgraced neuroscientist attempting to reenter the corporate scene, this cyberware is an attempt at creating a 'human firewall' - someone who can detect intrusions into computer systems through their own heightened senses.
